Package pl.kmolski.hydrohomie.account.service

Interface UserService

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.ReactiveUserDetailsService
All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService extends org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.ReactiveUserDetailsService
User account management service. Operations like user creation, removal, password changes, account enable/disable and user list fetch are handled here.

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<UserAccount> createAccount(String username, PlaintextPassword password, boolean enabled)
      Create the user account with the specified username, plaintext password and enabled status.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account
      password - the plaintext password
      enabled - the enabled status
      Returns:
      the new user's account
